website_summaries.verdict: Even though sizing may be an issue, once you find a pair that fits, these are versatile, attractive rain boots that are practical and comfortable.
pros: Sports a mid-calf height and an attractive gloss finish that make them both useful and stylish on rainy days
Ideal for wearing with socks for added warmth
cons: May run large in the foot, or fit either too tight or too loose in the calf depending on leg shape

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Size Down
customer_reviews.text: These boots definitely run large so I would size down if you're a half size. I am a size 8.5 (sometimes 9 depending on the shoe brand/fit) and decided to size UP. There was WAY too much room in the size 9 boots - even with the Hunter fleece socks. The size 8 boots fit perfectly for my size 8.5/9 feet :)
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Rojas

customer_reviews.title: A good compromise
customer_reviews.text: I have 17-inch calves, and I was concerned these would be too small. They actually go on pretty easily, even with thick socks, but alas, I can't tuck my pants leg in there too. They did become uncomfortable after several hours on my feet, but a pair of over-the-counter orthotics put a stop to that for the most part. You will need to insulate in the snow, but there is plenty of room in the foot area for extra padding. I bought these because I wanted a pair of boots that would be good in both rain and snow, and also look relatively nice, I think they will do.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bit concerned after receiving the boots. The main issue is that they aren’t keeping my feet 100% dry and I’ve been wearing the proper socks. The logo on the bottom of the heel is advertised as red but the pair I received has a light blue logo. Also, the box is a bit damaged with certain numbers blacked out. I called Hunter and was notified that this seller is not an authenticated seller so there’s no true way of knowing that the boots are real.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I Love these "Girl on the Morton Salt box" looking boots!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with Hunter Boots. They are super comfy, and if you add a Dr. Schoals furry foot pad insert they are even more yummy. I wear either a 7.5 to an 8 med. size lady shoe. I normally wear a 7 for Hunter. If you go with black ones you may lose the shiny. These yellow ones are super shiny and adorable, hitting your calf just right! I have the tall one's too, but these pop on quickly and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Hunter’s. The are definitely authentic and great quality. I wear a 7.5 and my old Hunter boots are a size 8...which are a bit large but still wearable. I ordered these in a size 7 and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BrewCityYogi

customer_reviews.title: Wellie Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a little extra on a 'fine' wellie! I needed a short, waterproof boot for my daily stable chores and working on the property. These are perfect! I have only worn them 3 days, but they have kept my feet dry & my socks mud-free. I ordered the shearling inserts, but am unable to use them as it makes the boot a little too tight with my bunion. That's ok, i'm not in a frigid climate, so no shearling is ok. My normal shoe size is 9.5, I ordered a 9. Perfect fit for me :-) Not to mention how "chic" I feel around the horses. :-)
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are wrong be careful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a size 10. I didn't try them on until today because I haven't needed them until today. Due to the unfortunate lack of rain here in Maine. When I did they were insanely large-not just a little but a lot! at first I thought it must be how Hunter boots run. But after further inspection I realized on the sticker it says European size 42 which equates to US size 12 normally. The sticker lists "10F" for US.. not sure what that means, but either way I am now stuck with a pair of adorable expensive boots that I can't wear and can't return..
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! This is my first pair of Hunters, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the violet purple color. They are also more comfortable than I was expecting. For me they fit true to size (size 6 and ordered size 6), and I have room to wear thick fuzzy socks with them on extra cold and wet days.
customer_reviews.author: Tamarra

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased the tall ones and due to the fact that I have a wide calf had to return them. Purchased the short was a bit hesitant since I have a difficult time finding a boot that will actually fit my calf. So happy these fit! The color is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Zooly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, Happy Life!
customer_reviews.text: My wife digs these boots. The only downside is, you better order down and not up. My wife is a 7 1/2 and I originally bought her an 8. Far too big, so I ordered her a 7, much better. She can still wear the nice thick Hunter fleece liners/socks w/the 7.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great boot - size up not down
customer_reviews.text: Love Hunter boots. They will keep your feet warm and dry in anything. I already have tall black ones and wanted something different. The short boot is a nice height and a little more practical than the tall. The military red is a great deep red color. The sizing can be difficult. I am a 7 1/2 and tried the 7 this time as the 8 is a little loose, but it is just a bit too short. So if you are between sizes - size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people said you should order a size down. I’m a size 6 and decided to stick with a size 6 because ordering a size 5 would’ve been like $40 more. Without wearing boot socks/winter socks the shoes are a bit loose in the front but with winter socks on they fit perfectly!!! I’m super happy with these boots, they came super fast & they’re sooo cute!!! I can’t wait to actually wear them !! Also if you’re short like me, the short boots are the way to go 👍🏽🥳
customer_reviews.author: gkad

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but run large; watch for free returns
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 6 shoe but need a little additional heel padding in some loafer-style shoes. Based on the reviews regarding size I ordered size 6. They were way too big; not just a little loose but very much too big. I returned these and reordered a size 5 which fit perfectly. I noticed as I went through various colors available in sizes 6 and 5 that not all have free returns. Apparently all the orders for these boots are through Amazon but originate from various vendors.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Loose but cute
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 7-7.5 so I decided to order a size 7 in these boots. They fit good but are a little loose, my heal slips when I walk but I think a size 6 would be too small. They are really cute and shiny. I ordered Hunter wool insoles and those help with the slipping and will keep my feet warm in the winter. I would definitely buy them again. I compared these boots to similar Ugg ones and they are comparable and the fit is very similar, I just liked the look of these more because they have the side buckle and Hunter logo in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Keller

customer_reviews.title: Military Red is soooo pretty in person.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for about 5 hours of manual farm work (shoveling, hauling, spreading) and they were great. Waterproof, thick yet bendy for range of movement. The only thing I'll do differently is wear thicker socks... my pinky toes are a little sore.
customer_reviews.author: Z K

customer_reviews.title: Half size down is a good fit.  Color is darker than in picture-
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and NOT heavy at all like I thought they would be! I wear a 7.5 to an 8, I ordered a 7 -and they fit perfectly. I decided to finally buy good rain boots after going through 4 cheap pairs that all ended up leaking. Very cute but the color is NOT as bright as in photo- a much more muted blue - so i am returning them for a different color but other than that, think they're perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Sally88

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Perfect for the annual fall/winter rain festival ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Perfect for the annual fall/winter rain festival in the Pacific Northwest. Since I am 5' 2", that they hit just below the knee but do not jut up against the knee when I walk is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these! I wore them to the pumpkin patch and they were super comfy to walk around in for the 3 hours we were there. They were a tiny bit loose but if I wear thicker socks they'd fit perfectly! Plus the shiny red color is really pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Authentic.  Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than I anticipated, I do suggest a sock, even if it is a short bootie otherwise they are difficult to take off. Have worn them 3 times since receiving due to all the spring showers we have had, purchased the short style and they bend easily as I walk. I have purchased similar Hunter rain boots as gifts in the past directly from Hunter and these are original authentic Hunter boots. Came in original hunter box and inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They run a full size big!
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely run big. I have worn a size 8 my entire adult life in every other shoe I own (not including the occasional size 7.5 or 8.5 for the love of fashion!) I ordered these in an 8 and they were huge. Returned for size 7's and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Cagle Tracy

customer_reviews.title: So darn comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: As with others reviews, these run a bit large. I wear an 11 in Toms and a 10 in Clark’s, an 8.5 to 9 in Western boots. These fit perfect in a 10 with a full insole. These put the spring in your step! Absolutely amazing comfort and very cute. I have large calves from riding, and no fit issues around the calf area, plenty of room in this shorter model. Wouldn’t be good for working in snow all day, but are warm enough for being out for an hour or two doing chores, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lrcritterdog

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7.5 bought a 7 off of other reviews. Fits very well it does seem slightly loose but I believe without that it would be difficult to put on. I also have wide calves that I was worried about but these boots are not tight and don't rub on my calves. They lack the amount of support I'm used to. There is some support but not much for arch support. With my back problems I tend to go for very supportive footwear but I bought these for rainy days and the garden/yard work. So far they havent bothered my back
customer_reviews.author: v.w.

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot !
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 or 9 wide and I ordered these in a 9 and can wear them comfortably with a sock. I have worn them all day and they don't hurt my feet. I actually ordered a second pair. Love them !
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots! I own tall hunter boots but they were too cumbersome to take off and put on at work. But these short ones are perfect. They are very comfortable - I walk 30 minutes to work and they don't cause any problems along the way. I will say the blue was a little darker than I expected, but I actually really like that, especially since they are glossy! Highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ancona

customer_reviews.title: Does what they say
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you check the size before you buy! The first pair I bought were a size 5...a mistake on my part because I didn't recheck my order before I placed it....bummer. The second pair I ordered were just right! Perfect, true to size! I have the tall gray ones as well. I like these better because they aren't too tight on my calves like the gray ones. These sit right at the beginning of the calf so they are Perfect. They're cute AND they keep the water off of my tootsies.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Parker

customer_reviews.title: Large in the foot, not in the calf.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5, and the size 9 was big on my foot - even though Amazon’s size guide had suggested I actually order the size 10. Glad I read other reviews and ordered the size down! Unfortunately, as someone with wide calves these boots are goth at the top. I would not recommend these for people with wide legs. Otherwise, they loook like nice boots.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieO

customer_reviews.title: If you’re wondering between gloss or matte finished...go with the gloss!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. So cute and stylish. The gloss finish is spot on. So glad I got the gloss rather than the matte finished! Love my first Hunter boots, since I’ve been waiting to get them. Normally wear a size 7, purchased a size 6 and they are perfect. Even if I put on socks, still have enough wiggle room for comfort. Going to NYC for the weekend and projected rain in the picture, so can’t wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: caroline goler

customer_reviews.title: My favorites!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Go with your normal size. They do cause your feet to be cold on cool days but I Love being cold. Thick socks, I’ve been told, fixes the cold feet issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sandburg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE - charge restocking fee even though boots were scratched up
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Buyer beware. They charged a restocking fee for boots I returned because they were all scrapped up. They are not honorary prime free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these but I wish they would fix how the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these but I wish they would fix how the buckle lays. Looks kind of silly because the buckle is bunched up. Don’t get why it’s designed that way?
customer_reviews.author: C. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other reviews say you should size down one for these so if you wear a size 7 you should get a size 6 for yourself! I do thoroughly enjoy these, I do have a thicker calf and I had no problem with them! They are super super cute and very very trendy I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: pinkcovered

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5 and have high arches so I have trouble with boots cutting me across the top of my foot. These are very roomy so no issues. I bought an 8 and it's plenty long. While these don't come over your calf, they will come up to them. My calves are almost 17" around and these are just slightly roomy enough that they don't squeeze the base of my calf. However, if you have larger calves than mine, I wouldn't get them.
customer_reviews.author: CCCC1216

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Never going to buy ANY other brand/type!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have big calves, always hard to find boots and these were a little snug at first on my calves but after wearing them once or twice they loosened up a bit. I wear them with everything and I swear to god I never put stinky feet in them and I never WILL put stinky feet in them. I love these boots! They are heavier than most boots but they are just great quality. It takes a while for my toes to get cold in them and I use them in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8 - 8.5. theses are an 8 and are big enough to put on a pair of bulky socks. Very comfortable and cute. this was the cheapest I found them!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Hunter gloss boots 8
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and ordered a whole size smaller. My usual 9 foot and the 8 fits excellent. Cane quickly and boxed well. Recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I didn’t size down or up as some reviews suggested, I purchased my normal size 8 in the violet, and they fit comfortably. I’m planning on ordering the knit hunter liners for the colder Maine weather. They’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots
customer_reviews.text: I received these boots today and I love them. The violet color is my favorite. I have the black gloss from a department store and these are the same quality. I normally wear 8 1/2 in all my other brands of boots but I have my Hunter Boots in size 8 and they fit perfectly. I’d go closest whole number down if you’re a half size like me. Enough room for me to wear thick socks if needed and they’re very comfortable. Can’t get over how gorgeous the color is!
customer_reviews.author: KLR

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide calves and was nervous about ordering these but they fit perfectly. Not loose with jeans tucked in but not too snug at all. I do wish I'd ordered down a size instead of up since I'm an 8 1/2 but with thick socks they'll be perfect. Can't wait for another rainy day!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyNora

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality, fit true to size or smaller
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why everyone is saying the boots run large. Maybe I got a fake? I wear size 8.5, ordered 8 and could barely squeeze in. I wanted to wear the boots with Hunters winter inserts and I doubt I'll even fit into size 9 with socks. I ordered size 10 and they fit just right with the Hunters winter insert. A bit roomy but I wouldn't want them smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Laky

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Painful to Walk In
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a pair of Hunters for years, but I had to return them. The foot of the boots fit well, but the calf was very wide. In addition to looking weird, the top of the boots alternately smacked the front and back of my legs as I walked. Bummer. I’m giving them three stars because they looked and felt well made. Maybe a taller pair would work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots two years ago almost to the day And they are all cracked. If you look on the manufacturers website they offer a two year warranty however it appears that this is not an authorized seller of the boots therefore the warranty is Null and void and you are out of luck if you have any issues with the product. These were expensive boots and I would have expected that they lasted longer than they did after barely even wearing them. If you want Hunter boots, order directly through their website - not Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boots had been used
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to finally get a pair of Hunter boots!! Arrived in a box with enough stickers on it to show that they had been previously returned a few times. I ordered the gloss and there were prints and gunk all over them! They were made in China and were no where the quality they used to be. Sorry Hunter won't be ordering any others!!
customer_reviews.author: lynn f

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Rain Boots Pretty A+
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I like the extra toe room (fits more like a tennis show with the wider toe and more expected size arch & heel). They are heavy and substantial. I plan on wearing them out in my garden when spring gets here, and they have plenty of traction for it. I am shorter, so I bought the mid-height boot. (Measure as per the description to be sure you can walk in the high boot--my daughter has that one).
customer_reviews.author: HappyWife

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love my new boots! They fit perfect. I wear a size 9 or 9 1/2 and bought a 10. I have big calves and these are slightly loose which is good and can wear thick socks.. the taller boots I didn’t like for driving and didn’t have much calf room these are perfect. I got the glossy red and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Grannie of 7

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Cute, stylish, and absolutely perfect for a rainy or not so rainy day!! Got the black and violet with red on the way! Violet is beautiful, black is classy, and red for a pop of color! Only downside I would say is be prepared for your feet to be cold! Even with thick socks on, my feet get chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WIERD FIT =(
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for calf length cute daily use rainboots as I live in the pacific northwest. The fit was a tad hard to put my foot in to begin with but then when I walked it was SOOOO UNCOMFORTABLE!!! Iike the plastic kept scraping at my knee as I moved....very bad fit....I recommend going into a store and trying on in person. Highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: The best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: The boots are perfection!!! This is my first pair of Hunter boots and they did not disappoint. I was trying to find a pair in stores, but they didn’t have the color I wanted. These were perfect and for a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Ganze

customer_reviews.title: I love the shaft length and calf width, because I am only 5 ft 2 inches.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and definitely cheaper than if I should have bought this in the store. Love my new hunter boots. The calf and shaft is perfect for me and I cannot wait for it to rain so I can show them off. So happy that I could find dark midnight navy color Hunter Boots. You can wear nice thick socks with them too. Want to buy pink ones too when they are back in stock. Very comfortable. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Kotze

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Boots
customer_reviews.text: Definitely size down one full size. I am usually a size 10 and I ordered a women's 9 and they fit perfectly, even with thick socks. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Naso

customer_reviews.title: So great looking and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of these boots in red and wanted another pair in black. I normally wear 7.5, but I take a 7 in Hunter boots. If you can try these on in a store, I would recommend it. The boots themselves are wonderful, and I get lots of compliments, especially when I wear the ribbed Hunter socks.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen Stover

customer_reviews.title: HUGE & HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so heavy. I wear a size 7 & the boots fit like an extra wide 8. I do have tall Hunters & they run true. Not sure why these are defective. Also, after 2 wearings, the top started fraying. It’s difficult to drive in these. The shaft circumference is also HUGE made for extra-width ankles/calves. Terrible. I will be giving them away to someone who has giant feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia

customer_reviews.title: I love these but they run about 1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they run about 1/2 size bigger. I wear a 7 1/2 and I ordered a 7. There's plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Graber

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this is one of the most fashionable and popular boots out there. I struggled with the size a bit and the Hunter site was very helpful. I measured my foot according to their specifications and the fit is perfect. Can’t wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Wh!t

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: Great rain boot, very tolerable to wear during the day. Ofcourse you aren't getting the support and comforts from a tennis shoe, but it is not uncomfortable at all. The height is perfect allowing for an easy on easy off experience.
customer_reviews.author: briezie

customer_reviews.title: Tight on large calf
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly a true Hunter product. It is very water proof and wonderfully sturdy. However, I got the calf length ones due to larger calves, and they cut me in a weird place. I love them so much I still qear them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Francke

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely adorable. Unfortunately they were too small. I also found them to be very rigid which was uncomfortable and hard to walk in. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Aunttt

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Hunter boots won’t let you down. I purchased these for my daughter to use walking to class in college and she is well satisfied with the support, comfort and keeping her feet dry. She liked them so much I purchased a pair for myself. She was right, they are a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the shorter boots would fit my calves better and these do fit and I can wear tall socks with them but I can't tuck my pants in them. They are very comfortable, more than I expected and not too hard to put on or take off considering the kind of boot they are. Overall I am happy, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J.

customer_reviews.title: and not black like these. We had to return the 6's because ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots for my daughter who wears a 6.5. The US 7's fit perfectly with a little room to grow. I will say that these boots are BLACK, even thought the box says "Dark Slate". We ordered a "Dark Slate" in the size 6 and those were a dark gray, and not black like these. We had to return the 6's because they didn't fit. She says she likes the black better but I think she just wanted to keep them. Not sure why the colors were different. I wish I had taken a picture of them side by side but I had already packed up the others to return.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Love these BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5 normally but I order these in a 9 and they fit perfect even though offer no arch support at all. But hey, they are rain boots so they definitely do their job. Plus I get compliments every time I wear them! I did end up ordering a pair of hunter socks and that makes wearing the boot much more bearable for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cleere

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t taken them off!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE my bright yellow boots! I get so many compliments on them everywhere I go! Shipping was right on time and they arrived in the original Hunter box and packaging. I can’t wait to order more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mwitte

customer_reviews.title: Stylish boots that keep safe moisture
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I read reviews by their customers recommending people with half sizes to go down in size, not so in my case. I ordered the size up and am extremely happy I did. With the boot socks, it fit perfectly, almost a little snug. So I can imagine how disappointed I would have been had I ordered a size down. They are great keeping snow and water out. Not a boot for extreme snow play but they didn’t recommend them for that type of activity. It is the perfect boot for what I wanted. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: So cute but run a little big
customer_reviews.text: I love how these boots look and they have held up great so far. however, they do seem to run big and they are very hard to walk in if i dont wear very thick socks or the hunter winter sock liners. Other than that i love them. I think a half size smaller would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not as the product appears
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a matte green boot as pictured, but it was definitely glossy. Pretty heavy for a mud boot, and there is absolutely no support, got huge blisters on my heals after a 10 minute walk.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Army red
customer_reviews.text: The army red is much darker than the picture, like a dirty emerald red or maroon. Disappointed. Quality seemed great. I'm more like 10.5 woman's so I got the 10 it seemed like a very about fit, but I didn't actually wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for short legs
customer_reviews.text: These boots are EXACTLY what I wanted! The regular ones are too tall for my short legs. I knew they were rumored to be slightly large and that’s perfect for wearing winter socks with. I love the color, the fit, the look...everything.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love my orange boots! Perfect shade of orange. I have a slightly wider foot (I don't buy shoes in wide, but Converse aren't super comfortable for me..?) I ordered my normal shoes size of 7. They fit perfectly. I love them. They are comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True Hunter boots!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy these from Amazon but after receiving them I was pleasantly surprised. They came neatly packaged in a hunter box. They are exactly as described. I am very happy I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Shorties for the win! Love these
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the tall version of these boots but I am only 5’5” and have large calves so decided to return them and buy these. I LOVE THEM. I am excited to actually wear them in the rain/snow. I typically wear a size 8.5-9 in normal shoes but ordered these in a size 8 and they fit perfect even with a pair of socks on. They came in an authentic seeming Hunter box/packaging. I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a size 8, my shoe size, from a different retailer. I have a skinny foot/leg, and the boot was big and bulky on me and so I returned. I bought a size 7, which my foot is normally too big for- but the boots fit nice. If you have a skinny foot/leg I’d recommend going a size down, and if you’re a half size, go down rather than up as these do run large! But really like the quality. They are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: AMAZED
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. Love the comfort. LOVE ALL THE COMPLIMENTS I GET!!! I have trouble finding boots that fit over my calf’s. I bought the size I normally get in shoes and they were a PERFECT fit!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Carson

customer_reviews.title: they look so good that I don’t wait for a rain day to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am getting a lot of use out of these bootstrap.... they look so good that I don’t wait for a rain day to wear them! The navy shirt socks roll over the top and show off the Hunter label also!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews that these run big, but thankfully I ordered my normal size. I wear an 8.5 to 9 and ordered the 9s which fit perfectly. The boots do squeak when I walk on hard surfaces, I am hoping that goes away.
customer_reviews.author: J Booher

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, look and style of these. I feel safe walking on snow. Purchases the Hunter boot sock which works well using these as winter boots. I feel a bit of slippage as I walk but I attribute that to the boot construction—it is not made to mold to the foot and I like the roominess.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Red but not red-red
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to be a little truer in color to the photograph...these are more maroon than candy apple red like I was hoping. Huge Georgia fan, it’s hard to wear these bama looking boots..
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: and after a particularly rainy/icky spring in Boston I finally splurged on them and I couldn't be happier. I got the glossy red color (which is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are FABULOUS! I've wanted a pair for years, and after a particularly rainy/icky spring in Boston I finally splurged on them and I couldn't be happier. I got the glossy red color (which is a bit bold for me, to be honest) but I get compliments everywhere I go. I was worried they would be uncomfortable because they're rubber, but they're SO comfy. I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I am a size 7 and feel the size is a bit loose but not worth the back and forth of trying a new size. Wearing thick socks is a must to prevent blisters, had I known that I would have ordered something else for gardening. They are also kind of hard to get off despite being loose. I like the glossy red and it cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not size down
customer_reviews.text: Great boots... Definitely too small! I’m a true 7.5 and I bought a 7 because the reviews said size down... do not! I ordered an 8 and they’re perfect, can be worn with regular socks and room to wear with the Hunter fleece liners.
customer_reviews.author: Moire

customer_reviews.title: Love Hunter boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots ordered were darker blue than I expected - However, I liked the color anyway. The fit was tighter than my old hunters of same size and style. Hopefully, they will loosen up after wearing for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and found these rainboots to be very comfortable. They don't make my feet sweat. I liked them so much, I ordered a second pair in matte black.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and worth it
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t boots that run large. Don’t believe that, its not true. I’m an 11 in most shoes, so these fit nice as a 10 and they were wide enough. They have no room though...they aren’t loose, they fit with socks but there is very little wiggle room. I have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and style. Perfect for keeping your feet dry. Even better with the short, Hunter boot socks...while these are not snowboots, the addition of the socks, will keep your feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and completely legit! I was worried they would be some kind of knock off for the price but they’re the real deal! I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: jlbonacci

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: Love my Short slate grey Hunter boots ! I am a side 10 and ordered a size down. Size 9 fit perfect with a thick sock. I am so happy I got the short ones .. love them !! Should have had these months ago with all the rain we have had in Maryland
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for muddy and snowy terrain wheeling my Jeep. They are perfect. Rise down easy and with sock inserts convert into a winter boot capable of moving through a foot of snow with getting my pants wet. I have used them a ton and I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: TravelFan24

customer_reviews.title: I stomped in all the puddles like a mofo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mother effers! Since it doesn’t rain often in Los Angeles, I stomped in all the puddles like a mofo!!! My feet wet completely dry. Fit great. And I got lots of compliments on my hot red shiny boots. I even bought a pink pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: I like the boots themselves
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots themselves. But I didn't realize until I'd worn them outside that they sent over the wrong size. I figured they were kinda snug because they are new shoes initially. If I hadn't worn them outdoors already, I would return them.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Kawambwa

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a 1/2 size, go with the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a 1/2 size, go with the smaller size. I’m an 8 1/2... ordered an 8, and they are perfect. Even with thicker socks, the smaller 8 fits fine. If I had gone up to a 9 they would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: cwink1

customer_reviews.title: Hunter rain boots
customer_reviews.text: wish they would have stated they ran large and would have ordered a whole size smaller. Have never worn because they are a full size larger even with thick socks. In the back of my closet. Maybe my feet will grow!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sammie bouton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & really comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have very muscular calves & these fit great! Ordered my normal size. So fun & cute in the teal color! Very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Hunter Boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots were authentic and the price was awesome, so I'm happy. You really can't go wrong with Hunter boots and the red is just adorable, so I would recommend them. But remember, Hunter boots run small, so size down (i.e., I wear an 8 1/2 in shoes and I purchased an 8).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rain Boot
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal and of quality - I wear a size 10 and boots fit perfectly with space to wear socks -
customer_reviews.author: CA Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Hunter rain boots are the best. Bought these to replace my last pair which ...
customer_reviews.text: Hunter rain boots are the best. Bought these to replace my last pair which I have had for over 10 years and just noticed a little hole in the heal. Can be worn all year, but if you are primarily using in snow, you need the warm boot liners and might go up half a size.
customer_reviews.author: LabMom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but you have to size down
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 10... but they were too big so I had to order a size 9. Size 9 fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Vilma P. Toranzo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought a less expensive brand, which I returned -- too difficult getting them off with my high in-step. No such problem with these. Size is as expected -- can wear with thin or thicker sock.
customer_reviews.author: blueskies

customer_reviews.title: Fully Functional Hunter Hunter Boots
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that it rains most of the year in the state of Washington. I had to relocate to Washington for a job 3 months ago and found that it literally rains every day. To avoid walking around in soggy shoes, I purchased these Hunter boots. They are as cute as they can be. In addition they’re completely functional. So now I don’t care if it’s raining or not, I love wearing my new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Snods

customer_reviews.title: Hunter on a value price
customer_reviews.text: I scored a great price on these boots. They were my size and the color I was looking for....
customer_reviews.author: Sareni Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, size up for high arches
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots that I waited a long time to order. I love them and they fit TTS. I have a very high arch so I ordered one size up to accommodate for it and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t really had much opportunity to wear these yet. They fit great, look nice and they will get plenty of use during the rainy season.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Karlsson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I’m glad I’d read the reviews about sizing. I typically wear a 7 1/2 so I ordered the 7. They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: maura kohlhafer

product_meta.title: Hunter Women's Original Short Gloss Rain Boots
product_meta.description: This short rain boot is handcrafted from 28 parts, in the same form as the Hunter Original Tall, with a high gloss finish. Shaft measures approximately 10" from arch. Platform measures approximately 0.25". Fully waterproof and functionally led, Hunter also provide an aestheic, for which the rainboot has develped a global fashion following. Hunter is a British heritage brand, 160 years young.
